after_item1: All your personal data will be permanently deleted
after_item2: History of appointments and visits will be anonymized
after_item3: You can create a new account at any time
delete_text: Please delete all my personal data
email_option: You can also send a request to email:
help_desc: If you have questions about the data deletion process, contact us via Instagram
how_to_desc: To delete all your data, send us a message in Instagram Direct
intro: We respect your right to privacy and provide the opportunity to delete all your personal data from our system.
processing_desc: We will process your request within 7 working days and send a confirmation of data deletion.
title: Data Deletion
